contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |image_map = LocatieZaanstad.png |image_map1 = Map NL - Zaanstad - Krommenie.png |map_caption1 = The statistical district of Krommenie in the municipality of Zaanstad. |name = Krommenie |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 = [[Zaanstad]] |area_km2 = 540 ha |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Noord-Holland]] |population = 17.410 |population_as_of = |density = |website = |image_shield = Krommenie wapen.svg |image = [[File:Krommenie kerk.jpg|250px]]<br /><small>De Nicolaaskerk</small><br />[[File:Krommenie raadshuis.jpg|250px]]<br /><small>Het oude gemeentehuis</small> }} {{Coord|52|30|N|4|46|E|type:city(14800)|display=title}} '''Krommenie''' ({{IPA-nl|ˌkrɔ.mə.ˈni|-|}}) is a town in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[North Holland]]. It is a part of the municipality of [[Zaanstad]], and lies about 15 km northeast of [[Haarlem]]. Krommenie was a separate municipality until 1974, when the new municipality of Zaanstad was created.<ref>{{Repertorium Nederlandse Gemeenten}}</ref> The statistical district "Krommenie", which covers the village and the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 17,330.<ref name="CBS2">Statistics Netherlands (CBS), ''Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005'' [http://statline.cbs.nl/]. As of 1 January 2005.</ref> ==Train services== The town is served by [[Krommenie-Assendelft railway station]]. From here there are 4 trains an hour to [[Amsterdam Centraal railway station|Amsterdam]] in one direction and Uitgeest - Alkmaar in the other, with a journey time of 25 minutes. ==References== <references/> ==External links== *{{Kuyper|Krommenie|nh|krommenie}} Map of the former municipality, around 1868.
